jobInfo.postDescription:
Job Description
Senior Software Engineers in Test play an integrated role with Software Engineers to build the next generation of Business Intelligence platforms at MicroStrategy. We are looking for talented individuals to fill a variety of roles within our Technology team to support our Enterprise Assets and SDK teams.

Your focus:


•    Execute software quality and test cases for new features and existing capabilities across the MicroStrategy suite of products
•    Validate and verify large scale test results to ensure MicroStrategy products continue to lead the industry in scalability, responsiveness, and reliability within a quality engineering team
•    Build consensus, prioritize, and execute quality engineering activities based on facts, information, and weight of evidence in a collegial work environment
•    Communicate the vision of product as it would be used with MicroStrategy’s customers related to quality
•    Test and respond to software requirements build into the test planning and report and analyze the results
•    Utilize automated test tools and debuggers to monitor program code, inspect program variables, ensure user interface quality, set performance benchmarks, and analyze results
•    Recommend solutions where analysis of situations or data requires a review of a variety of factors
•    Keep records of issue logs and resolutions internal to the quality engineers and from external technical support
•    Document technical notes, methods, and best practices for use in assuring quality across MicroStrategy’s products

Qualifications
•    Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, Engineering, or related program of study or equivalent work experience
•    1-3 years of experience verifying and validating software code to improve the overall quality of the product
•    Working knowledge of software test methods and techniques; experience with the visual testing method is preferred
•    Experience with testing web-based applications and / or web-application servers
•    Experience building automated test scripts and/or programs using tools (e.g. Selenium, Jenkins, Soap UI, JMeter)
•    Familiarity with one of the following programming languages: Java, C#, Groovy, Perl, PHP, or Python
•    Previous experience in testing for products built in Java, Javascript, (REST, Web Services)
•    Familiarity with RDBMS is highly desirable
•    Experience with manual (experiential) end-to-end testing
•    Demonstrate analytical and problem solving skills
•    Possess the ability to be process-driven with an ability to focus on details
•    Willingness to work in Agile environment 
•    Team-oriented individual, positive attitude, energetic, result & delivery oriented, keen interest on quality and intense attention to detail
•    Strong command of the English language, both written and spoken

Additional Information
All your information will be kept confidential according to EEO guidelines.

“985” “211” 知名高校优先
熟练英语日常工作环境优先
jobInfo.address: 杭州西湖区西湖国际科技大厦

brandComInfo.introduce:
微策略MicroStrategy是全球最大的商务智能软件公司(NASDAQ:MSTR)。自1989年创建之日起，MicroStrategy一直是全球商务智能软件领域的领导者，并不断引领业内技术发展潮流。公司拥有商务智能分析平台、移动网络平台、信息安全平台、云计算平台的等顶尖的产品，并广泛服务于全球各国的政府、机构和财富500强各行业的企业，成为客户商业活动、经营运作、计划决策中不可缺少的一部分。

多年以来，凭借强大的技术资源和卓越的经营理念，MicroStrategy及其产品一直处于行业的领导地位：
•	第一个在互联网及移动网上提供商务智能软件的公司
•	移动智能产品在业界多项主流分析报告中排在首位
•	拥有领先的数据分析，智能计算及信息发掘能力
•	可以高效处理高于业内其它软件100倍的数据量
•	获得了大量高质量的发明专利（美国）

MicroStrategy的客户涵盖各行各业，典型客户包括：
•	全球10大银行中前8席及美国4大商业银行的所有席位
•	全球医疗保健行业前8强的5席
•	全球保险行业前6强的5席 
•	全球制造行业前10强的8席
•	全球制药行业前10强的9席
•	全球通讯公司前10强的所有席位
•	全球娱乐媒体公司前5强的4席
•	全球零售业前500强的2/3席位

更多信息可访问微策略官网：https://www.microstrategy.com/zh
